channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH LIVE: Intuitive Machines attempts to land probe near lunar south pole
item.description: Commercial company Intuitive Machines is attempting to land a probe near the lunar south pole. If successful, it will be the second time a private com...

item.title: At a housewares expo in Chicago, talk keeps turning to price hikes from tariffs
item.description: The Inspired Home Show in Chicago draws housewares industry insiders from all over the country to network and show off their latest gadgets. This year...

item.title: Fighter jets accidentally drop bombs during exercises, injuring 8 South Koreans
item.description: The air force said the jets were taking part in a drill with the U.S. military in Pocheon, a city close to the border with North Korea, when they drop...

item.title: Head of federal whistleblower office drops legal battle challenging his firing
item.description: Hampton Dellinger's decision to end his legal fight comes after a federal appeals court cleared the way for his firing by President Trump.

item.title: Amanda Nguyen on Blue Orgin's first all-female spaceflight mission, new memoir

item.title: Analysing Russian strike on Ukrainian hotel
item.description: BBC Verify's Nick Eardley takes a look at verified footage and images from the a Russian missile attack on a Ukrainian hotel.

item.title: That galaxy next door? It's home to a monster black hole
item.description: The Large Magellanic Cloud, a close neighbor to the Milky Way, may house a giant black hole. It's the closest supermassive black hole outside of our g...

item.title: Authorities find no sign of shooter after responding to Florida naval base
item.description: Authorities responded to an active shooter situation at a military base in Pensacola, Florida, officials said.

item.title: Nigerian senator suspended after making sexual harassment claims
item.description: Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan had accused Senate President Godswill Akpabio of sexual harassment.

item.title: Players union welcomes life ban for Gabon football coach over sexual abuse
item.description: Patrick Assoumou Eyi has been found guilty of sexually abusing multiple young footballers.

item.title: Veterans fired from federal jobs say they feel betrayed, including some who voted for Trump
Jobs lost in every state and lifesaving cures not discovered: Possible impacts of research cuts
item.description: Ripple effects of the Trump administration’s crackdown on U.S. medical research promise to reach every corner of America.

item.title: How much would a $20,000 18-month CD earn now?
item.description: An 18-month, $20,000 CD provides long-term guaranteed returns. How much could it earn now? Find out here.

item.title: President Trump pauses Mexico tariffs until April 2
item.description: President Trump on Thursday said he is pausing 25% tariffs on U.S. imports from Mexico.

item.title: Trump has dropped a high-profile abortion case in Idaho. Here’s what that means

item.description: Crowds filled the Sambadrome to watch samba schools face off at Rio Carnival.

item.title: House votes to censure Texas Democrat Al Green for protest during Trump address

item.title: Teen armed with gun overpowered by passengers onboard plane
item.description: The 17-year-old was restrained after sneaking into a Melbourne airport and getting onto an aircraft, police say.
